vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting the renewal of Specific Use Permit No. 2341 for a bar, lounge, or tavern on property zoned Tract A within Planned Development District No. 269, the Deep Ellum/Near East Side District, on the south line of Exposition Avenue, west of Parry Avenue
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval for a three-year period, subject to conditions
Z201-223(RM)

Z201-223(RM)
